title: OIDC infinite loop

labels.name: triage/duplicate
labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

body:
### Describe the bug

Hi, whenever we try to authenticate against Azure AAD we are getting infinite loop. We have upgraded from 2.6.2 to 2.16.1 and I have literally no clue why this is happening now. I turned on DEBUG & TRACE level and this is what I can see and the log is full of this
`
2023-02-07 20:11:20,413 skb55822 dashboard-dev.jar[6048] DEBUG [io.qua.oid.run.CodeAuthenticationMechanism] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-2) Starting an authentication challenge
2023-02-07 20:11:20,415 skb55822 dashboard-dev.jar[6048] DEBUG [io.qua.oid.run.CodeAuthenticationMechanism] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-2) Authentication request redirect_uri parameter: http://localhost:9090/dashboard/oauth2/callback
2023-02-07 20:11:20,418 skb55822 dashboard-dev.jar[6048] DEBUG [io.qua.oid.run.CodeAuthenticationMechanism] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-2) q_auth cookie 'max-age' parameter is set to 1800

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

Infinite loop going in circles to Microfost OIDC endpoint
